snippet: Jessica Johnson, the owner of Johnson Security Bureau, graduated from 10,000 Small Businesses, a Goldman Sachs program, in September 2010. She discussed her 10,000 Small Businesses experience with Adriana Gardella for The New York Times's You're the...
abstract: Jessica Johnson, the owner of Johnson Security Bureau, graduated from 10,000 Small Businesses, a Goldman Sachs program, in September 2010. She discussed her 10,000 Small Businesses experience with Adriana Gardella for The New York Times's You're the Boss blog.
lead_paragraph: Jessica Johnson, the owner of Johnson Security Bureau, graduated from 10,000 Small Businesses, a Goldman Sachs program, in September 2010. She discussed her 10,000 Small Businesses experience with Adriana Gardella for The New York Times's You're the Boss blog. Read more »

headline.main: One of Goldman Sachs's 10,000 Small Businesses
